sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-02-01 20:03:42.118260 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-02-01T16:19:37.2668954-05:00.

body.ab: <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0057.02" unit="tei:head"/> <sga-add place="interlinear" sID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11742"/> <longToken>Ch V– 113</longToken> <sga-add eID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11742"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/><lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__2"/>Hethen put the following letter <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__3"/>into my hands.<lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__4"/>"To V. Frankenstien <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__5"/>Geneva <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11760">Apri</del> <mdel>l</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11765"/>March <sga-add eID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11765"/> 18 <shi rend="underline"></shi> 17—<lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__6"/>"Mydear Cousin<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/><lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__7"/>"I cannot describe to you the <w ana="start"/>uneasi<lb n="c56-0058__main__1"/>ness<w ana="end"/> we have all felt concerning your <lb n="c56-0058__main__2"/>health. We cannot help imagining that <lb n="c56-0058__main__3"/>your friend Clerval conceals the <w ana="start"/>ex<lb n="c56-0058__main__4"/>tent<w ana="end"/> of your disorder, for it is now <lb n="c56-0058__main__5"/>several months since we have seen <lb n="c56-0058__main__6"/>your handwriting and all this time <lb n="c56-0058__main__7"/>you have been obliged to dictate to <lb n="c56-0058__main__8"/>Henry – Surely Victor you must have <lb n="c56-0058__main__9"/>been very ill <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11822"/>and this makes us very wretched as much so <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0058.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__1"/>nearly as <mdel>t</mdel><lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__2"/>after the death <lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__3"/>of your dear <lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__4"/>mother <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11822"/> .Myfather was almost <lb n="c56-0058__main__10"/>persuaded <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11851">of this</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11854"/>that you were indeed dangerously ill, <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11854"/> and could hardly <lb n="c56-0058__main__11"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11861"/>be <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11861"/> re <mdel>f</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11868"/>st <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11868"/> rain <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11872"/>ed <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11872"/>from<sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11877"/> <metamark function="insert">߶</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11877"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11883"/>undertaking<sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11883"/>a journey to Ingolstadt.<lb n="c56-0058__main__12"/> <longToken><del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11889">I</del> <del next="#c56-0058.02" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11893">but I entreated him not</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11896"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11898"/>to undertake it <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11898"/> </del> <del next="#c56-0058.03" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11902">because</del> <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11905"/> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11907"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11907"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11913"> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11915"/>for <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11915"/> </del> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11905"/> <lb n="c56-0058__main__13"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11922">although</del> <delSpan rend="vertical_line" spanTo="#c56-0058.04"/>his health is better now <lb n="c56-0058__main__14"/>tha <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11930"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11934"/>n <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11934"/> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11930"/> it has been since the death <lb n="c56-0058__main__15"/>of My beloved Aunt, yet <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11940"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11942">tha</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11945"/>the <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11945"/> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11940"/> fatigue <lb n="c56-0058__main__16"/>might <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11952"/>have <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11952"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0058.04"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11957">make him very ill</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11960">and</del></longToken><lb n="c56-0058__main__17"/>Clervalalways wr <mdel>o</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11969"/>i <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11969"/> te <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11974"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11974"/>thatyou <lb n="c56-0058__main__18"/>weregettingbetter <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11981">and</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11984"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11984"/> <mdel>I</mdel><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11992"/>I<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11994">arden</del> eagerly<sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11992"/>hopeyou <lb n="c56-0058__main__19"/>will confirm this <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12001"/>intelligence<sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12001"/>soon in your own<lb n="c56-0058__main__20"/>handwriting for indeed, indeed Victor <lb n="c56-0058__main__21"/>we are all very <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12011">uneasy</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12014"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12014"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12020"/>miserable on this account <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12020"/> . Relieve <lb n="c56-0058__main__22"/>us from this fear and we shall <lb n="c56-0058__main__23"/>be the happiest creatures in the <lb n="c56-0058__main__24"/>world.– My uncleshealth<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12030">impro</del> is <lb n="c56-0058__main__25"/>now <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12038">well &</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12041"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12043"/> <unclear>far</unclear> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12043"/> </del> vigorous that he appears <lb n="c56-0058__main__26"/>ten years younger since last <lb n="c56-0058__main__27"/>winter. Ernest also is so much <w ana="start"/>im<lb n="c56-0058__main__28"/>proved<w ana="end"/>, <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12061"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12063"/>so <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12063"/> </del> thatyou wouldhardly <lb n="c56-0058__main__29"/>know him; he is now nearly sixteen <lb n="c56-0058__main__30"/>you know and has <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12071">quite</del> lost that<lb n="c56-0059__main__1"/>sickly appearance that he had <lb n="c56-0059__main__2"/>some years ago –he isquite well & <shi rend="underline">hearty</shi> <lb n="c56-0059__main__3"/>if I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12091">y</del> may use that term for it is <lb n="c56-0059__main__4"/>very expressive. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0059__main__5"/>"My uncle and I conversed <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12101">the</del> <lb n="c56-0059__main__6"/>last night a long time about what <lb n="c56-0059__main__7"/><lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12115"/>profession <sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12115"/>Ernest <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12120"> <shi rend="underline">should be</shi> </del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12126"/>should follow <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12126"/> . His constant <lb n="c56-0059__main__8"/>ill health when young has deprived <lb n="c56-0059__main__9"/><lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12141"/>him <sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12141"/>of the habit of application andnow<lb n="c56-0059__main__10"/>that he enjoys good health <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12146">we</del> he <lb n="c56-0059__main__11"/>is continuallyin the openair <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12151">on</del><lb n="c56-0059__main__12"/>climbing thehillsor rowing on the <lb n="c56-0059__main__13"/>lake.I, therefore, proposed that <lb n="c56-0059__main__14"/>he should <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12161"/>be <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12161"/>a farmer which you <lb n="c56-0059__main__15"/>know cousin is a favourite scheme <lb n="c56-0059__main__16"/>of mine –A farmer's is a very healthy <lb n="c56-0059__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12171">&</del> happy life; and the least hurtful <lb n="c56-0059__main__18"/>or rather the most benificial <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12176">of any</del> <lb n="c56-0059__main__19"/>profession. <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12183"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12183"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12189"/>of any. <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12189"/>My <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12193">father</del> uncle had an <lb n="c56-0059__main__20"/>idea of his being <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12201"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12201"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12207"/>educated as <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12207"/>an advocate, <mdel>&</mdel><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12215"/>that <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12215"/>through <lb n="c56-0059__main__21"/>his interrest <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12221"/>he might become <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12221"/>a judge. But besides that <lb n="c56-0059__main__22"/>he is not at all fit for such an <lb n="c56-0059__main__23"/>occupation, it is certainly <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12231">better</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12234"/>more <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12236">honourable</del> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12234"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12240"/>creditable <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12240"/>to <lb n="c56-0059__main__24"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12246">to</del> cultivate the earth for the <w ana="start"/>suste<lb n="c56-0059__main__25"/>nance<w ana="end"/> of man than <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12256">it</del> to be the <lb n="c56-0059__main__26"/>confid <mdel/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12268"/>a <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12268"/> nt & sometimes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12274">a helpmate</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12277"/>the accomplice <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12277"/> of <lb n="c56-0059__main__27"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12286">their</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12289"/>his <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12289"/>vices; which is the employment <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12295"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0059.03">^</metamark> <lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12304"/>&<sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12304"/><sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12295"/><lb n="c56-0059__main__28"/>of a Lawyer. And if he should become <lb n="c56-0059__main__29"/>a judge I said that <mdel>a</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12325">rich</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12328"/>the occupation of a prosperous <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12328"/> farmer <lb n="c56-0059__main__30"/>if it were not a more honourable<lb n="c56-0060__main__1"/>it was at least a happier employ <lb n="c56-0060__main__2"/>ment than that of a judge, whose <lb n="c56-0060__main__3"/>misfortune it was always to meddle <lb n="c56-0060__main__4"/>with the dark side of human nature <lb n="c56-0060__main__5"/>My uncle smiled and said that I <lb n="c56-0060__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12355">ou <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12357"/>g <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12357"/>t</del> ought to be an advocate myself; <lb n="c56-0060__main__7"/>which put an end to the conversation <lb n="c56-0060__main__8"/>on that subject <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0060__main__9"/>And now I must tell you a little <lb n="c56-0060__main__10"/>story that will please you. Do you <lb n="c56-0060__main__11"/>not remember <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12374">Ju</del> Justine <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12377">Martin</del> ? <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12386"/><sga-add eID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12386"/>Moritz?<lb n="c56-0060__main__12"/>Perhapsyou donotI willtherefore <lb n="c56-0060__main__13"/>tell youherstoryin a few words.Mad. <lb n="c56-0060__main__14"/>MartinherMotherwas a widow with <lb n="c56-0060__main__15"/>fourchildrenof whom<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12398">this</del> Justine <lb n="c56-0060__main__16"/>was the third. This girl had always been <lb n="c56-0060__main__17"/>the <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12406">favou</del> favourite of her father <lb n="c56-0060__main__18"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12413">and</del> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12422"/><sga-add eID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12422"/>but <mdel>by</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12427"/>thro <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12427"/> an odd perversityher Mother<lb n="c56-0060__main__19"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12433">never</del> could <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12439">bear</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12442"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12442"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12448"/>not endure <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12448"/> her andafter the <lb n="c56-0060__main__20"/>death of M.<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12456">Martin</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12459"/>Moritz <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12459"/>treated her very ill. <lb n="c56-0060__main__21"/>My aunt observedthis, andwhen Justine <lb n="c56-0060__main__22"/>was<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12467">ten</del> twelve years old tooprevailed <lb n="c56-0060__main__23"/>on her mother to allow her to live <lb n="c56-0060__main__24"/>atourhouse.<sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12477"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0060.03">X</metamark> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/> <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__2"/>The republican <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__3"/>institutions of our <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__4"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12498">state</del> country,have <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__5"/>produced simpler <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__6"/>& happier manners <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__7"/>than those which <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__8"/>prevail in the <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__9"/>great monarchies <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__10"/>that surround it.<lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__11"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12516">Ju Whilst</del> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__12"/>Hence there <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__13"/>is less <w ana="start"/>dis tinction <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12534">s</del> <w ana="end"/>between theclassesinto which human beings have been divided,& the lower orders being neither so poor nor sodespisedare more refined & moral. A servantatGeneva does not mean the same thing as a servant in Franceor England —Justine <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12576"> <shi rend="underline">was</shi> </del>thusrecieved intoourfamily to learnthe duties ofaservant, whichin our fortunatecountrydoes not includea<w ana="start"/>sacrifize<w ana="end"/>of the <w ana="start"/>dignity<w ana="end"/> of a human being.<longToken><zone eID="c56-0060__left_margin"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12477"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12618">Where</del> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0060.05"/>she was taught <lb n="c56-0060__main__25"/>all the duties of servant & was very <lb n="c56-0060__main__26"/>kindly treated.</longToken> I dare say that you now <lb n="c56-0060__main__27"/>remember all about it, for Justine<lb n="c56-0060__main__28"/>was a great favourite ofyours,& I<lb n="c56-0060__main__29"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12639">remember</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12642"/>recollect<sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12642"/>you oncesaid, that<lb n="c56-0061__main__1"/>ifyou were<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12657">a</del> in an ill humour<lb n="c56-0061__main__2"/>one glance fromJustine,could <w ana="start"/>dissi<lb n="c56-0061__main__3"/>pate<w ana="end"/>it <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12671">from</del><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12674"/>for<sga-add eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12674"/>the same reason <lb n="c56-0061__main__4"/>that Ariostogaveconcerning the <lb n="c56-0061__main__5"/>beauty ofAngelica:– shelooked so<lb n="c56-0061__main__6"/>frank heartedand happy. My Aunt<lb n="c56-0061__main__7"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12687">was very fond of her which</del> <del next="#c56-0061.05" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12690">caused</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12693"/>concieved anattachment for her, by which she<sga-add place="sublinear" Tavernier –Sheis awidow<lb n="c56-0064__main__17"/>and much older thanManoirbut <lb n="c56-0064__main__18"/>she ismuch<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13325">adv</del> admiredand a <lb n="c56-0064__main__19"/>favourite withevery body.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/><lb n="c56-0064__main__20"/>Ihave written myself intogood<w ana="start"/>spi<lb n="c56-0064__main__21"/>rits<w ana="end"/>, dearCousin yet I can not conclude <lb n="c56-0064__main__22"/>without again anxiously enquiring <lb n="c56-0064__main__23"/>concerning your health— Dear Victor, if <lb n="c56-0064__main__24"/>you are not very ill write yourself <lb n="c56-0064__main__25"/>and make your father and all <lb n="c56-0064__main__26"/>of us happy or— I cannot bear to <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__1"/>think <mdel>of</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13364"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13364"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13370"/>on <sga-add eID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13370"/> the <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__2"/>other side <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__3"/>of the question <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__4"/>my tears <w ana="start"/>al<lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__5"/>ready<w ana="end"/> flow <lb n="c56-0064__main__27"/>Your very affectionate Cousin <lb n="c56-0064__main__28"/> <milestone next="#c56-0064.04" spanTo="#c56-0064.03" unit="tei:seg"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13396">dearrest</del> – dearest Victor <metamark function="separate">)</metamark> Elizabeth Lavenza <lb n="c56-0064__main__29"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0064.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c56-0064.04"/> write–
